text: The Men's 50 metre breaststroke competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 11 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Adam Peaty||align=left|||align=left|25.95||Budapest||25 July 2017 |- |African record||align=left|Cameron van der Burgh||align=left|||align=left|26.54||Budapest||25 July 2017 |- |Championship record||align=left|Cameron van der Burgh||align=left|||align=left|28.05||Bloemfontein||17 October 2016 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
